alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 31 at 4:26AM CDT until November 02 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 degrees possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama and south central and southwest Georgia. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
